pages.text: 52|15|to kya ye jaadoo hai ya tumhen sujhaee nahin deta
52|16|isamen pravesh kar jao, phir sahan karo ya sahan na karo, tumapar samaan hai. tum usee ka badala diye ja rahe ho, jo tum kar rahe the.
52|17|nishchay, aagyaakaaree baagon tatha sukhon mein honge. prasann hokar usase, jo pradaan kiya hoga unhen unake paalanahaar ne tatha bacha lega unhen, unaka paalanahaar narak kee yaatana se.
52|18|prasann hokar usase, jo pradaan kiya hai unahen unake paalanahaar ne tatha bacha lega unahen unaka paalanahaar narak kee yaatana se.
52|19|(unase kaha jaayegaah) khao aur piyo manamaanee, usake badale mein, jo tum kar rahe the.
52|20|takiye lagaaye hue honge takhton par baraabar bichhe hue tatha ham vivaah denge unako badee aankhon vaalee striyon se.

52|21|aur jo log eemaan laaye aur anusaran kiya unaka, unakee santaan ne eemaan ke saath, to hm mila denge unakee santaan ko unake saath tatha nahin kam karenge unake karmon mein se kuchh, pratyek vyakti apane karmon ka bandhak[1] hai.
52|22|tatha adhik denge unhen meve tatha maans jisakee ve roochi rakhenge.
52|23|ve ek-doosare se usamen lete rahenge madira ke pyaale, jisamen na koee vyarth baat hogee, na koee paap kee baat.
52|24|aur phirate rahenge unakee seva mein (sundar) baalak, jaise vah chhupaaye hue motee hon.
52|25|aur ve (svarg vaasee) sammukh honge ek-doosare ke prashn karate hue.
52|26|ve kahengeh isase poorv[1] ham apane parijanon mein darate the.
52|27|to allaah ne upakaar kiya hamapar tatha hamen surakshit kar diya taapalaharee kee yaatana se.
52|28|isase poorv[1] ham vandana kiya karate the usakee. nishchay vah ati paropakaaree, dayaavaan hai.
52|29|to aap shiksha dete rahen. kyonki aapake paalanahaar kee anugrah se na aap kaahin (jyotishi) hain aur na paagal.
52|30|kya ve kahate hain ki ye kavi hain, ham prateeksha kar rahe hain usake saath kaalachakr kee
52|31|aap kah den ki tum prateeksha karate raho, main (bhee) tumhaare saath prateeksha karata hoon.
